title: Egyptien serevr
body:
i live in Egypt and i play in oce xD . because of a long story i don't think u would like to know  ^.^
but here in Egypt there are a lot of people play LOL from kids 7-8 years old to people at the game of 30! 
so i think making an Egyptian server will be a successful move by riot
if not plz make any server free to trans fare to soon cause my ping is so high and fps so low here in oce 
ty

replies.body:
That's unfortunate. The ping, that is.

Nevertheless I don't forsee free transfers coming any time soon. Sorry.

You could send in a support ticket asking for it but I'm doubtful.
